entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SECNAV @USNavy @USMC Sad to learn that @secnav is an asshole as well as an unsupportive, uncaring commander. @usnavy deserve a commander that cares about the wellbeing of those under his command. This shitstorm won’t end well for those who blindly follow a sociopathic #LiarInChief #COVID19
